title: Roman Bridge: Le Vistre de la Fontaine Palaeochannel
description: Remains of a Roman bridge spanning a former channel of Le Vistre de la Fontaine south of NÃ®mes have been excavated. Work at the site also provided significant evidence for Roman-era waste and lead contamination transported down the river from the urban center of Nemausus.
